update enterprise

open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enteprise_name = #{entepriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
